rules.fullName: SSSW - Email Bypass Validation
SSSW - Outbound Customer Email %5BNo status change%5D
rules.description: Outbound Email - Doesn't change status of case if case.Preventstatuschange__c is true.

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Expected Incoming Customer Closure Email
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status to closed when an incoming Close Case email is received.
rules.formula: Incoming && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && Subject = 'My case can be closed'

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Expected Incoming Customer Email
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && (CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails1__c ,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails2__c,ToAddress)) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && ( TEXT(Parent.Status) = $Setup.QM__c.Customer_Status__c || ( NOT(ISBLANK(Parent.HeldToOpenOn__c )) && CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.Awaiting_Reopen_Queue__c,Parent.OwnerId)) || Parent.IsClosed ) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && NOT(CONTAINS(Parent.Subject,'Bulk Upload')) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.Mailer_Daemon_Email__c))&& Subject <> 'My case can be closed' && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Expected Incoming Customer Email %28Allocate To Queue%29
rules.description: SSSW - Used to run the queue allocation when an incoming email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && (CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails1__c ,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails2__c,ToAddress)) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && (TEXT(Parent.Status) = $Setup.QM__c.Customer_Status__c || Parent.IsClosed ) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && NOT(CONTAINS(Parent.Subject, 'Bulk Upload')) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress, $Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c)) && TEXT(Parent.Network__r.Contact_Facility__c) <> 'ServiceNow' && TEXT(Parent.ProductCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.ProductSubCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.EnquirySubType__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.Type) != '' && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.Mailer_Daemon_Email__c)) && Subject <> 'My case can be closed'&& NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Expected Incoming Network Email
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming Network email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && ( ( CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) || CONTAINS(CcAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) ) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c)) ) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && TEXT(Parent.Status) = $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW')&& NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Expected Incoming Network Email %28Allocate To Queue%29
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming Network email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && ((CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) || CONTAINS(CcAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c)) ) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && TEXT(Parent.Status) = $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && TEXT(Parent.ProductCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.ProductSubCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.EnquirySubType__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.Type) != ''

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Outbound Customer Email
rules.description: Outbound Email - Sets Status to "Awaiting Customer Response", if not awaiting the Network.
rules.formula: AND(NOT(Parent.IsHLC__c),NOT(Parent.IsCR__c), NOT(Incoming) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName, 'SSSW') && FromAddress = $Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c && TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && NOT( Parent.Owner:Queue.QueueName == 'SSSW Awaiting Reopen') && NOT(Parent.PreventStatusChange__c) && ( NOT(CONTAINS(CcAddress, FromAddress)) || ISBLANK(CcAddress) ) && NOT(CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c)))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Outbound Customer Email - Status Change
rules.description: Outbound Email - Sets Status to "Awaiting Customer Response", if not awaiting the Network.
rules.formula: NOT(Incoming) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName, 'SSSW') && FromAddress = $Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c && TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && NOT( Parent.Owner:Queue.QueueName == 'SSSW Awaiting Reopen') && NOT(Parent.PreventStatusChange__c) && ( NOT(CONTAINS(CcAddress, FromAddress)) || ISBLANK(CcAddress) ) && NOT(CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Unexpected Incoming Customer Email
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && (CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails1__c ,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails2__c,ToAddress)) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && (AND(TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Customer_Status__c,TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.New_Status__c) && NOT(Parent.IsClosed)) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c))&& NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Unexpected Incoming Customer Email %28Allocate To Queue%29
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming email is received. NEEDS PROD UPDATE
rules.formula: Incoming && (CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails1__c ,ToAddress) || CONTAINS($Setup.QM__c.SharedMailboxEmails2__c,ToAddress)) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && (AND(TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Customer_Status__c,TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.New_Status__c) && NOT(Parent.IsClosed)) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && TEXT( Parent.Network__r.Contact_Facility__c) <> 'ServiceNow' && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.CusEmail__c)) && TEXT(Parent.ProductCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.ProductSubCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.EnquirySubType__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.Type) != ''&& NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Unexpected Incoming Network Email
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming Network email is received.
rules.formula: Incoming && ( ( CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) || CONTAINS(CcAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) ) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c)) ) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && (TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && NOT(Parent.IsClosed)) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW')&& NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-generated')) && NOT(CONTAINS(LOWER(Headers), 'auto-submitted: auto-replied'))

rules.fullName: SSSW - Q - Unexpected Incoming Network Email %28Allocate To Queue%29
rules.description: SSSW - Used to update the Case Status when an incoming Network email is received.
rules.formula: Incoming && ((CONTAINS(ToAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c) || CONTAINS(CcAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS(FromAddress,$Setup.QM__c.NetworkEmail__c))) && NOT(Parent.Permanent_Close__c) && (TEXT(Parent.Status)<> $Setup.QM__c.Network_Status__c && NOT(Parent.IsClosed)) && CONTAINS(Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName,'SSSW') && TEXT(Parent.ProductCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.ProductSubCategory__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.EnquirySubType__c) != '' && TEXT(Parent.Type) != ''

rules.fullName: SSSW - Update Case Origin to Fax
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10)
